subtitle: Javascript snake hosted on Vercel service
text: This is my current competitor battlesnake, it uses a next.js endpoint and runs the latest push of the git repository battlesnake-starter-vercel-attempt . Still under work, it uses a recursive flood-fill algorithm to decide it's next move while also accounting possible future moves of opponents.

subtitle: Private testing copy of Transferred Vercel running on local hardware

images.alt: Self Host Mac Testing's Snake Logo
images.title: Local testing copy

text: This is a local, unpublished copy of Transferred Vercel Attempt that I use for testing out different strategies and ensuring operation before publishing to the competition version. It runs off a self-hosted device and is not available for public competitions.
